## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                | Type             | Default               |
| ---------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------ | ---------------- | --------------------- |
| `action`   | `action`    | The action that you would like to perform. | `string`         | `undefined`           |
| `darkMode` | `dark-mode` | If true, the dark mode styles get applied  | `boolean`        | `false`               |
| `headline` | `headline`  | The headline of the component.             | `string`         | `undefined`           |
| `img`      | `img`       | The url for the image.                     | `string`         | `"us-flag-small.png"` |
| `size`     | `size`      | The size of the component                  | `"base" \| "sm"` | `"sm"`                |
